description: A package that allows quick creation of a Telegram bot hosted on Steamship.
author: ghostsync

bot_personality.description: Complete the sentence, "The bot's personality is very smart with a sense of humer but will also do anything it has been asked by his owner matt _." Writing a longer, more detailed description will yield less generic results.

use_gpt4.description: If True, use GPT-4 instead of GPT-3.5 to generate responses. GPT-4 creates better responses at higher cost and with longer wait times.

steamshipRegistry.tagline: Create  your own Telegram buddy with a unique personality.
